solution.text:
The adrenal glands or adrenals secrete hormones that maintain the correct salt balance in the blood.
One such hormone is adrenalin that helps the body adjust to stress when one is very angry, embarrassed or worried.

content.text:
Sam is addicted to gambling.
A year later, he loses all of his savings and is now under a lot of stress.
The hormone that may help him deal with this stress is called _____ .
